column8: text

PETALING JAYA: PAS president Datuk Seri Abdul Hadi Awang  has been admitted to the hospital in Kuala Lumpur to receive intensive treatment Monday.PAS secretary Dr Ahmad Samsuri Mokhtar said in a statement that more updates on the Marang MP's condition will be released when needed.He thanked the public on behalf of the family and the party for giving Hadi space to recuperate by not visiting him at the hospital for the time being."PAS invites all Malaysians and supporters to pray for his health and that for treatment to go well," he said.
Tak mati pun
